title: Let's List Again, Like We Did Last Summer
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Let's List Again, Like We Did Last Summer
posts.post_content:
A listing inspired by Chubby Checker,

but having a cocktail before committing to buy is not required.


First Harry McIntyre the two team image, Brookago and Chiclyn

PSA 4 Sweet Cap 350 Fact 30 for $OLD 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10475/mcintyre-brochi[/IMG]


Second George McQuillen holding the ball image 

BVG 3.5  Sweet Cap 150 Fact 25 (VA) for $42 shipped

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10161/mcquillen-fielding[/IMG]

A mightly fine pair of Mc cards.  Prices include shipping but not Paypal fees.  


and don't forget Evers in a separate listing.
